named-query.name: Category.byName
named-query.query: Select distinct c From Category c Where c.name = :name

named-query.name: Category.contByName
named-query.query: Select count(c) From Category c Where c.name like :name

named-query.name: Category.listOrderBy
named-query.query: Select distinct c From Category c, SubCategory s, Product p, ProductStock ps, ProductSubCategory psub Where c.id = s.category.id And s.id = psub.subCategory.id And psub.product.id = p.id And p.id = ps.product.id And ('unlimited' = :unlimited OR ps.stockAmount >= :amountStock) Order By c.priority, c.name

named-query.name: ProductImage.withCampaign
named-query.query: Select distinct pi1 From ProductImage pi1, CampaignProduct cp1, ProductStock ps1 Where pi1.product.id = cp1.product.id And ps1.product.id = pi1.product.id And cp1.campaign.active = :actCam And cp1.active = :actCamProd And pi1.keyPicture = :keyPicture And ps1.stockAmount >= :amount Order by pi1.id desc

named-query.name: ProductImage.countWithCampaign
named-query.query: Select count(distinct pi1) From ProductImage pi1, CampaignProduct cp1 Where pi1.product.id = cp1.product.id And cp1.campaign.active = :activeN2 And cp1.active = :activeN1 And pi1.keyPicture = :keyPicture

named-query.name: ProductImage.searchByIdProductKeysDisck
named-query.query: Select distinct p1 From ProductImage p1 Where p1.keyPicture IN :keysPicture And p1.product.id = :id Order by p1.id DESC

named-query.name: Product.listByIdSubCategory
named-query.query: Select distinct p1 From Product p1 Join p1.subCategories sub1 Where sub1.subCategory.id = :id Order by p1.id DESC

named-query.name: Product.listByIdCategory
named-query.query: Select distinct p1 From Product p1 Join p1.subCategories sub1 Where sub1.subCategory.category.id = :id Order by p1.id DESC

named-query.name: Product.searchClean
named-query.query: Select distinct p1 From Product p1 Where p1.nameClean Like :nameClean Or p1.descriptionClean Like :descriptionClean Order by p1.id DESC

named-query.name: ProductStock.listByProductId
named-query.query: Select distinct p1 From ProductStock p1 Join p1.specification sp Where p1.product.id = :productId and p1.stockAmount >= :minAtockSmount Order by p1.id DESC
